properties.name: Sheet 4: [Bounded by Bowery, Rivington Street, East Street,Grand Stret, Water Street, Corlears Street, (Pier Line) South Street, James Slip, James Street, Madison Street and Catherine Street.]
properties.description: from Plan of New York City, from the Battery to Spuyten Duyvil Creek. Showing every lot and building thereon; old farm lines, strreet numbers at the corners of blocks, railroads, steamboat landings, bulkhead and pier lines, etc. Based on the surveys made by Messrs. Randall & Blackwell, and on the special survey by J. F. Harrison.
